Tracy
27 years young

messages.messageBody:
WOOOOO HOOOOOO Taxless Tacoma Valerie


--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., " Valerie Stewart" <vlos@o...> wrote:
> now none of us would ever call you old.
> Johanna
>
> And that doesn't make me the "old Valerie", by the way.
>
> Valerie in Tacoma
>
> ***I am counting on my daily alpha hydroxy baths to keep me young.
Thanks
> Johanna-Donna.
>
> Valerie, ageless and finally done with her taxes in Tacoma

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] welcome to the new Valerie
messages.msgSnippet: now none of us would ever call you old. Johanna And that doesn t make me the old Valerie , by the way. Valerie in Tacoma ***I am counting on my daily alpha
messages.messageBody:
now none of us would ever call you old.
Johanna

And that doesn't make me the "old Valerie", by the way.

Valerie in Tacoma

***I am counting on my daily alpha hydroxy baths to keep me young. Thanks
Johanna-Donna.

Valerie, ageless and finally done with her taxes in Tacoma

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: welcome to the new Valerie
messages.msgSnippet: thats funny, I get called Donna all the time. Johanna Life is the ultimate learning experience! ... From: Valerie Stewart To:
messages.messageBody:
thats funny, I get called Donna all the time.
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!
----- Original Message -----
From: Valerie Stewart
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, April 29, 2001 11:17 PM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: welcome to the new Valerie


Thank you Valerie. I'm 45 years old, so maybe I could be the 'old new
Valerie?'

**No, no. Thank YOU for being older, <ahem>, more mature than I am.**

I have to ask. Have people called you "Beverly" most of your life? I
get called Beverly as much as I get called Valerie. They can never
tell me why they made the mistake.

**Actually I've always been called Cathy. And it's a Cathy that they know
personally. Once a waiter was offended that I would not admit I was his
cousin Cathy from Wisconsin. I told him I'd admit it if he'd pay for lunch
and how is my dear aunt? But he was a snit and wouldn't go for it. Well, you
can't pick your relatives.**

Valerie living in the Canadian bush but formerly in Louisiana

**Valerie born in Tacoma and back living in Tacoma...I don't get out much**



Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: welcome to the new Valerie
messages.msgSnippet: I like that! I admit that one time I did pretend to be Beverly and hugged the elderly couple and told them it was so good to see them. They then backed off and
messages.messageBody:
I like that! I admit that one time I did pretend to be Beverly and
hugged the elderly couple and told them it was so good to see them.
They then backed off and looked at me and said, "You're not Beverly.
She's not that nice."

***Valerie, sometimes you just can't win. Good for a laugh, though.

the other Valerie in Tacoma

messages.subject: Re: welcome to the new Valerie
messages.msgSnippet: **No, no. Thank YOU for being older, , more mature than I am.** Now mature is something I ve never been accused of...not sure I can live up to that
messages.messageBody:
**No, no. Thank YOU for being older, <ahem>, more mature than I am.**

Now "mature" is something I've never been accused of...not sure I can
live up to that one."


**Actually I've always been called Cathy. And it's a Cathy that they
know personally. Once a waiter was offended that I would not admit I
was his cousin Cathy from Wisconsin. I told him I'd admit it if he'd
pay for lunch and how is my dear aunt? But he was a snit and wouldn't
go for it. Well, you can't pick your relatives.**

I like that! I admit that one time I did pretend to be Beverly and
hugged the elderly couple and told them it was so good to see them.
They then backed off and looked at me and said, "You're not Beverly.
She's not that nice."


**Valerie born in Tacoma and back living in Tacoma...I don't get out
much**

I lived in Louisiana for 45 years, Canada since March... talk about a
leap!
